Reviews.Title: “Gretna Inn Great Room”
Reviews.Author: gccurry
Reviews.Content: We could not have asked to be treated any nicer than we were at Gretna Inn. Very pleasant experience. We will be staying at this property on our next Branson visit. Thanks for making our stay very enjoyable. Christeen C Arkansas

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel with Great Value.”
Reviews.Author: Manny S
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel for the Great Value Price. Clean and simple. Owners are very nice and helpful. Microwave, refridgerator , and Flat screen TV. Nice pool. Stayed there The Last Two years and willl be back again.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Nathaniel D
Reviews.Content: This hotel was a great experience for my wife and I. The staff and owners are very nice and treat you like family. The rooms are very clean and have flat screen HD televisions along with free wifi and AC that works very well...and the hotel has a very clean pool out front. You cant beat the price either or the location. The Gretna Inn is located near everything! We will def be staying here again and thanks to the owners and staff for treating us so kindly and making our vacation a memorable one!!! I highly recommend this Hotel!!

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous!!!”
Reviews.Author: Mary K
Reviews.Content: My friends and I came to Branson for a "girls" vacation. We stayed 4 nights at the Gretna Inn and could not have been happier!!! Richard, the owner, is by far the best personality in all of Branson!!! The price was right and the rooms were clean. We would definitely stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “GREAT!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Jon B
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Gretna Inn based upon reviews I found here on trip advisor. The price of the room was at a very low cost with high cost quality. The staff was very friendly and helpful, the room was clean, cozy and they AC was excellent. the location of the hotel was a great plus. It is located within very short walking distance to many attractions but yet away from the noise. the hotel has an at home atmoshphere and that is what we loved. I will be staying here everytime I go to Branson which will be monthly. STRONGLY recommend this place!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Clean hotel, deeper pool, and friendly owners”
Reviews.Author: OklahomaPirate
Reviews.Content: The Gretna Inn is an older hotel but very clean! The beds were comfortable and the outdoor rectangular (clean) pool was very nice and cool on a hot summer day! The deep end of the pool is almost 7 feet deep which our teens loved since several hotels in Branson only have pools that are 4-5 feet deep. "The Track" is an attraction directly behind the hotel with go-karts, bumper boats, mini-golf and a giant swing. We will probably book the family room on our next stay. We had some noise issues with our lower level room, but it was mostly due to inconsiderate people above us. The owner took care of it for us and we were very grateful. We give the Gretna Inn a pat on the back for giving us a good place to stay at a great value while on vacation!

Reviews.Title: “Like Family”
Reviews.Author: chromealiscious
Reviews.Content: Great rates and friendliest owners in town. Right off the main strip the Gretna Inn is close to many attractions. It is very clean and very reasonably priced. Stay 10 times and get the 11th night for free. Try this hotel next time!

Reviews.Title: “A welcoming place”
Reviews.Author: Lana M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Gretna for a weekend and were very pleased. As it is off of Hwy 76, we avoided the terrible traffic. We were able to walk from our room to just about everything. The pool was a god-send as it was terribly hot-we spend a good part of the day there, then went out in the evening. Our room was spacious and the air conditioning nearly froze us on low!! The large TV was super for watching the olympics and the microwave and refrigerator allowed us to stay in when we wanted to. Breakfast was great-coffee & donuts were really good & fresh. The manager was EXTREMELY friendly, welcoming and helpful. The price was really low for Branson during the tourist season. We have a new place to stay when we go to Branson-the Gretna!

Reviews.Title: “Great location/price”
Reviews.Author: Raven G
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay! Affordable, nice clean room, flat screen tv, pool & located right on the strip! Great for families, located within walking distance of the sky coaster, mini golf and water bumper cars!

Reviews.Title: “As nice as they said!”
Reviews.Author: beca4120
Reviews.Content: Friends told us to stay at the Gretna when we were in Branson, because it was nice, clean and priced right. Just like they said, it was all three. It was close to attractions and good restaurants (try the Uptown). The managers were so nice and helpful, too. We'll be back. Were telling our friends to check it out, too.

Reviews.Title: “good place”
Reviews.Author: Diana C
Reviews.Content: we have stayed at gretna inn for several years. The owners are very friendly and helpful. Clean place. would highly recommend this place.very quiet area and The owners will help with anything to make your stay happy.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: jenrose80
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a weekend trip in Branson. Did not have any reservations but wanted something on the strip or close at least. This is located on the Blue route just down from Titanic. The nice thing is the back of the hotel is within walking distance to The Track, Andy's Frozen Custard, Pizza Wold, Lost Treasure mini golf, and much more!!! We had a single queen room, was small, but were only in there to sleep so it worked for the 2 of us. Room was very clean!!! Would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Haven Of Rest”
Reviews.Author: Danny M
Reviews.Content: We were warmly welcomed by Richard & Racquel. Our room was spacious and very clean. Each day when we returned to our room it had been cleaned and freshed. It is within walking distance of alot of shows. The special "Gretna Blend" coffee & donuts were appreciated each morning. Very clean.

Reviews.Title: “Overnighter!”
Reviews.Author: Jim B
Reviews.Content: We recently spent the night here and were greeted by a most personable manager, who made us feel welcome immediately! The room was very nice, clean and located close to many area attractions.Great value and service.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean and Excellent Service”
Reviews.Author: BHylton
Reviews.Content: We went to Branson for a weekend getaway and decided to stay at the Gretna Inn. So glad we chose them!!!!! Very clean, comfy bed and very very nice and sociable owners. Service was excellent. Its location is very convenient for walking to attractions. We will always stay with them when we go back!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Two Good nights in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Wayne S
Reviews.Content: WE had previously stayed at this motel prior to the present ownership. Our stay this time was just great. We stayed two nights with a Queen double bed and the room was neat and clean (really clean) . For me personally the best part was the comfortable bed///////////

Reviews.Title: “Vickie F”
Reviews.Author: NANAHouston_Missouri
Reviews.Content: very good hotel ,can't beat the price very clean,frig,microwave ,.close to every thing,would stay there again very good people

Reviews.Title: “Very pleased!”
Reviews.Author: Tiffany S
Reviews.Content: We felt like we were right at home. It was very clean and very friendly service. They gave us all the info that we needed for all of the shows we wanted to see. We just had to go pick up our tickets and we were ready to go. The convenience was amazing. They are very close to all of the local attractions! We can't wait to stay with them again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay for those on a budget”
Reviews.Author: Sharon N
Reviews.Content: You can't beat Gretna Inn for the price or location. Nice clean rooms, mini-frig to keep snacks in, Close enough that you can walk to the strip to enjoy shopping and adventure. Owners are very hands on and are there to help if you need anything. We will be staying here for our next trips to Branson as well.

Reviews.Title: “Great for the money”
Reviews.Author: Don C
Reviews.Content: We opened the door to our room to find it clean and inviting with just enough amenities to make our stay comfortable. The apartment-sized refrigerator allowed us to bring "doggy-bags" back from the restaurant. Then the microwave let us have a warm snack after an afternoon of shopping. When we left each day, the cleaning staff straightened the room so we never came back to a mess. We were grateful for the clean towels and linens each day. When you go to Branson, you are only in the room to sleep and shower. The cleanliness of the room and the friendliness of the owners makes this a great value and a wonderful place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hideaway”
Reviews.Author: rlhstatic
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have enjoyed staying at this very reasonably priced motel for several years, with owner/managers Richard and Racquel. They are American English speaking Americans, and always the perfect hosts. We have now stayed in three different rooms on the first floor. All have been clean rooms with WiFi, a mini-fridge, microwave, large wall-mounted flat-screen TV with analog-cable & digital-cable channels including a full selection of music channels. The room AC worked fine. The motel has a nice outdoor pool. The rooms also have comfortable beds, telephone, clock, and the light fixtures that all have working bulbs! We enjoy sitting outside the room in chairs that are provided. They offer free coffee & donuts in the lobby, during the a.m.. Located a block off of the strip (Hwy 76) we have easily walked to several shows & other entertainment. We have extensively traveled the Americas and Europe, and highly recommend this motel as an excellent two-story, quiet, hideaway type hotel. Ron & Sylvia Hicks

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel!!!”
Reviews.Author: Marilyn M
Reviews.Content: Just returned home from Branson where we once again stayed at the Gretna Inn. We have stayed there for many years and truly enjoy the comfortable beds, the gracious owners, the clean rooms, the location to the shows, the reasonable prices and much more. I highly recommend this motel. John & Marilyn Gerdes

Reviews.Title: “Love this place”
Reviews.Author: marye6273
Reviews.Content: This was my second time staying at this hotel . I love it . I stay with my daughter and the rooms are very clean . There is WiFi , Cable tv , fridge . What more could you ask for for a overnight stay . We were able to leave our car and walk to the Titanic . The owners are awesome and the price is so good . We will be back next year for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Great rooms, location, and value”
Reviews.Content: We rented two rooms (220 and 223) and both were very clean and neat. Owners were very nice, English speaking, and seem to take pride in providing clean affordable rooms. Our room had a new mini fridge, microwave and wall mounted flat screen TV. There was no coffee pot in our room, but since we are not coffee drinkers it wasn't a big deal. The location is great as well; about a 1000 feet from the Gretna/76 Country Blvd. intersection. The only thing I could find wrong with our room was that the thermostat on the heating/AC unit was all or nothing. Therefore we went to bed in a room that was a little stuffy and woke up in a room that was a little cool. We would definitely stay here again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “A clean and comfortable room at a great price”
Reviews.Author: Johnny B
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Gretna Inn eight nights and was very pleased. The room was clean and comfortable, and the price was reasonable, which is all I look for in a hotel. The location is withing walking distance of several theaters and restaurants. It is also close to a light, which is helpful when you have to turn left on 76 Country Music Blvd. The owners are very pleasant and accomodating to their guests. I highly recommend the Gretna Inn.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Kimberly T
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Gretna Inn, many times since our first visit a couple of years ago. The couple who run it, Richard and Racquel, are wonderful host who make you feel at home. The rooms are clean, fair priced, and within walking distance of many, many attractions, restaurants, and entertainment spots. It is one of the best well kept secrets of a deal, while in branson. I just hope I will be able to get a reservation the next time I'm ready for another getaway in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable for a great price!”
Reviews.Author: AshleyBL
Reviews.Content: This is where we always stay for the Branson Cruise car show. The location is great. It is right off the strip and close to many attractions and restaurants. The rooms and appliances are very clean. This is one hotel that I'm not afraid to walk around barefoot in. And on top of everything, the new owners are very pleasant and approachable. I definitely reccommend this hotel for people who want a nice, comfortable hotel for an affordable price!

Reviews.Title: “I own a home in Branson, and still stayed at the Gretna Inn.”
Reviews.Author: nathaneadam
Reviews.Content: On a visit back, with our previous home being rented, we had to pick from the hundreds of hotels and lucked upon the Gretna. The new owners are clearly committed to providing a great experience, and seem to be renovating all of the rooms as they go. When it comes to the ~$40/night hotels in Branson, it can sometimes be like rolling dice to find one you'd return too. Gretna Inn will definitely get our future visits.

Reviews.Title: “Love this place”
Reviews.Author: travelman201157
Reviews.Content: We & our friends have been staying here for four yrs. and we love it. We stay here 3-4 times per year & have a great time every time we are there. Richard & Racquel continue to update and fix up the place while keeping their rates low. We love to see what has been changed every time we get there. The owners are like family to us, & we always spend time with them to see how they have been. They always take care of anything we need and if there is a problem they have it fixed as fast as they can, with a apology for it. The helicopter ride is next to it & it does make some noise coming & going but we are gone most of the day so it isn't much of a problem. We send all our friends here when they ask for a good place to stay & they all like it. Well keep on staying here because it is just like home. Not a lot of extras but good place to stay with being out doing things all day.

Reviews.Title: “Being a retired military man this Inn satisfied my needs quite well”
Reviews.Author: TonyGreenvilleTexas
Reviews.Content: Owners Richard and Racquel Hatfield very gracious. There are many reasons to stay here and not just the money. You really should click on Gretna Inn and or talk to the owners, they have spent big bucks updating this property and the trend continues. Thanks Hatfields, I had a great four nights in Branson and will try hard to one day return. May I also recommend the Up Town Cafe just four blocks south of Gretna Inn on Gretna. Great food especially breakfast at very good price and the service/folks are real fine too. My earlier selection for Excellent>Terrible was 180 degrees off. They should all be excellent. I was thinking Excellent was the first choice on the form. Sorry if I goofed.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and will defininely stay there next time in town!”
Reviews.Author: meezerpleezer
Reviews.Content: Very clean, close to the strip and wonderful people. The price was very reasonable and it was easy to get to.

Reviews.Title: “Another great stay without disappointment”
Reviews.Author: ARtraveler63
Reviews.Content: Previous reviews confirm this is our, I believe, 4th stay at this property. Each time, we return, there is evidence of diligent work on the property. The accommodations remain clean and welcoming. Location cannot be beat. Value cannot be beat.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding service, price, location”
Reviews.Author: Ronna73
Reviews.Content: This is a family owned motel that made us feel like we were part of their family. We found the coupon to stay here in one of the free travel books you pick up in a gas station. The room was clean. The motel is not on the strip but is walking distance. The couple who owes it were very hospitable. The only negative thing I could say is that the helicopter pad is next door and is kind of loud for about 15 min. in the morning. When we come back to Branson, this is were we are staying again.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful attitude of owners, clean, affordable place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: laceys2u
Reviews.Content: Have stayed in this motel off and on the last 4 years. Since Richard and Racheal have taken it over, it is so much better. Hospitality is great, both exterior and rooms totally rodone. Small pool, great for kids. Did stay just before Christmas and Richard and Racheal had left for a couple of months, and their replacements were much less than adequate, not up to their normal standards. Great price, clean rooms. If you are traveling with kids, recommend the family room, which nas basically 2 bedrooms with a bath to share, microwave, frigerator, and table. Bring your own food and eat comfortable at the kitchen table. Walking distance through a parking lot to 76. Backside watch the big skyswing, go-carts, and fun center for kids. The rooms are always clean. If you need anything Richard and Racheal are always very willing to get you or help you get whatever you need. Will stay there again and recommend to everyone looking for an inexpensive smaller motel that is clean.

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay! No disappointments here.”
Reviews.Author: ARtraveler63
Reviews.Content: On a previous visit we stayed in a room with a king bed, and was very pleased with accommodations. This time we chose a room with two queen beds and were equally pleased. The owner/managers provided the same "above and beyond" service, and there was an almost "bed and breakfast" environment considering the friendliness of the management and other guests. However, there was plenty of privacy. Considering the excellent daily rate, we did not anticipate luxurious accommodations, but did anticipate clean rooms with comfortable beds, and we were not disappointed. Room was equipped with a microwave and refrigerator, and there is complimentary internet access and free parking. There is a flat screen tv, and there was some difficulty with reception, but we were not in the room long enough to determine if this needed attention. We did encounter difficulty with the heating, but we managed this, and I am sure the problem was attended to after our stay. The location of the dressing area outside the bath room is another positive. Good coffee and donuts are available in the lobby until 9 a.m. Location is only minutes from anywhere you would want to go in Branson. Our 3 night stay at the Gretna Inn costs less than a one night stay at many of the properties in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Affordable, great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: LouIndependence
Reviews.Content: Gretna Inn...friendly staff and very clean rooms. What a bargain! The location is perfect for access to Branson action. I know where I'll be staying on my next visit!

Reviews.Title: “Gretna Inn is centered one block from the main strip and top notch quality!”
Reviews.Author: wesleymeyer1
Reviews.Content: My wife and I just spent 18 days in Branson, Missouri and we stayed at the best motel Branson has to offer! We had the time of our lives and enjoyed the motel's location and the people running it and those that work there. It is a gem of a place to stay in the middle of most of the action and yet is located on one of the streets where it is quiet and easily accessible. And perhaps for many it is also one of the lowest priced places to stay. This is a must stay again!!!

Reviews.Title: “couldn't ask for sweeter and kinder service than we got at gretna inn.”
Reviews.Author: maidinheaven67
Reviews.Content: We had a very enjoyabe stay on July 4th weekend. The service was outstanding. The kindness of the owners was better than excellent. They were there to serve us and answer any question we had and was so helpful and generous. Always had something kind to say and always presented us with a smile on their face. We are looking forward to our next stay at the Gretna Inn. Also, By the way, checked prices all over town and their's were great!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Owners!Fabulous hotel Rates!Near strip for walking purposes in BRANSON,GREAT AC,COMFORTABLE AND WONDERFUL POOL”
Reviews.Author: RobertaRaaschfamily
Reviews.Content: The Gretna Inn is a place that you will want to go back and stay if you go on vacation!!!

Reviews.Title: “Convenient location; basic, but clean accomodations. Great Value.”
Reviews.Author: ARtraveler63
Reviews.Content: Great service at this property. We checked in just before mid-night, but the innkeeper was extremely welcoming even insisting that he fill our ice chest with ice to chill our soft drinks. The room with a king bed and small table and chairs was basic and clean. The sink and dressing area was outside the bath/shower room. There was a flat screen tv. The doors were exterior doors, but I felt extremely safe. At stays in other properties in Branson, I have had concerns about the number of people who had access to our room, so valuables were left in the car. At this property, room access is limited, and I had fewer concerns regarding items left in room. Internet access was easy and speedy. The negatives about the Gretna Inn is that it is a "work in progress", and there are some kinks (as indicated in the previous review). However, I feel the innkeeper would have done their best to have corrected the problems reported by the previous reviewer had they been notified. The positives other than those already described is the daily rate and the convenient location. Our total charges for a five night stay was comparable to what we have previously paid for two nights. Considering this, we can plan trips to Branson more frequently. The property is located just off the main strip with easy access to main traffic corridors.

Reviews.Title: “Owners are very nice and helpful, staff very friendly, motel clean and convenient”
Reviews.Author: Cowboyup47
Reviews.Content: The owners, the Hatfields, are both very nice and helpful. The staff that we met could not have been nicer. The motel is conveniently located about a block off Hwy 76. You could walk to some shows, etc. if you wanted to, yet it is very quiet also, at least when we were there in November. The room, while not large, was very clean and comfortable and can't be beat for the price. If you are looking for a place to crash after a full day of shopping or hitting the shows in Branson, then this will fit your bill. We will definately stay with them again.

Reviews.Title: “This owner is a "keeper"”
Reviews.Author: cecilfan
Reviews.Content: We have been visiting Branson for 30 plus years, stayed at many of the offered motels, and have been through 3 owners at the Gretna Inn. With that said I feel qualified to say that with the current owners it is a total different experience staying there. It is now without a doubt the cleanest in town (including the high dollar chain brands). It is very obvious that the Hatfields are experienced and go well above and beyond with personal attention and attitude to make sure your stay is perfect. It is also obvious that they appreciate your business and are there for the long haul.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hospitality and Location”
Reviews.Author: crusherPa
Reviews.Content: We took the advice from my wife’s cousin and stayed at the Gretna Inn for 12 nights. We could not have received any better hospitality than we received at the Gretna Inn. The owners and staff made us feel at home and their hospitality was the best. Doughnuts and coffee every morning. Along with great advice on getting around Branson, and how to get discounts on tickets, was greatly appreciated. The owners treated us just like family. I would recommend the Gretna Inn as the best place to stay in Branson, clean easy to enter and leave the parking lot, large pool, great hospitality and best off all reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “A very worthwhile opportunitity”
Reviews.Author: franchas
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at several locations in Branson, because I am a Travel consultant, I try to stay at several of the properties to see what they are like before I can recommend them to my clients. This is one I definitely recommend. It is clean, the location is great, the pool is large and very clean. The staff is incredible and will do everything possible to make your stay a pleasant one. Donuts and coffee in the mornings. Discount show tickets. It just has it all. Fran Clark Broken Arrow Ok

HotelInfo.Name: Gretna Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 205 Gretna Road North, Branson, MO 65616
